metadata.title: Pilea Moon Valley, 2" Plant
features: Pilea Moon Valley has beautiful green leaves with hints of purple
As it matures, the plant will trail, making it an excellent hanging plant
description: Pilea Moon Valley Plant is also known as Friendship plant. This fast growing Pilea propagates very easily and cuttings from your plant will make perfect gifts for your plant loving friends!
Ceramic pot not included. Please view our shipping policy located below under the "Shipping" tab. Not all items offered online are available in-store
